titles.title: To convey certain submerged lands to the Government of the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. Conveys all U.S. rights, title, and interests in and to submerged lands in the area between the island of Saint Croix and the islands of Saint Thomas and Saint John to the Government of the Virgin Islands.
